resources.string: The easiest way to get new and used Books for your course is through this app.Register,browse books select and buy.
Find used or new Textbook for your course
Put online unused course materials for friends and mates to buy..
Welcome to buy and sell new or used textbooks platform.

What we do here is this, everyone having account can sell, search and buy used or new books from seniors or mates.This app is to help connect with Universities,Colleges and many others to make accessing textbooks for your course easy.Get registered to explore content.
